name: Binks
headline: A zero inventory, zero returns factory-to-consumer apparel company
description:
Getting clothes tailor-made is very common in India, especially for women. Saree blouses have to be tailor-made always due to their fitted nature & the non-stretchiness of typical Indian fabrics. 

The tailoring market however, hasn't evolved at all. It is highly fragmented with a low NPS. The end user experience demands a significant amount of the customer's time, involving visits to a physical shop & avoidable back & forth. This is increasingly unviable for busy urban Indian women. We make it super easy by letting women place an order online, get fitted at the comfort of their homes, help them with styling their fabric & deliver the made-to-measure clothes directly to their doorstep.

#  Shop latest readymade Saree Blouses and Ethnic Clothing for Women | Binks 
Binks is an ethnic wear fashion brand founded in 2019 that specialises in Saree Blouses. Binks has developed a proprietary sizing chart based on the unique measurements of 30,000 Indian women to ensure the perfect fit for their latest designs of [readymade saree blouses ](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/flexifit-blouses>), [kurta pant sets ](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/kurtas-and-kurta-pant-sets>), [Ready to wear 1 minute Sarees](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/saree>) and other ethnic wear. Their [FlexiFit™ Blouses ](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/flexifit-blouses>)collection offers a range of styles, including different neck designs (such as [V-neck](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/v-neck-flexifit-blouses>), [round neck](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/round-neck-flexifit-blouses>), [halter neck](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/halter-neck-flexifit-blouses>), and more), sleeve lengths, and colors. The FlexiFit feature provides comfort and a flattering fit, with options for various occasions, from [party wear](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/saree-blouses-festive-party-wear>) to [daily wear](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/saree-blouses-daily-work-wear>). Binks focuses on delivering well-fitted, stylish, and convenient ethnic wear for the modern Indian woman, with the ease of online shopping and free shipping worldwide. 
## Latest And Premium Saree Blouse Designs for Indian Women
The world of saree blouses has evolved significantly, with designers experimenting with various styles, fabrics, and embellishments to cater to the modern Indian woman's tastes. Premium saree blouse designs now incorporate luxurious fabrics such as [silk](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/saree-blouses-artificial-vegan-silk-fabric>), velvet, and brocade, often adorned with intricate embroidery, sequins, and beadwork. Contemporary styles like off-shoulder, cold-shoulder, and backless blouses have become popular, allowing women to make bold fashion statements. Traditional designs have also been reimagined, with innovative cuts and patterns adding a modern twist to classic silhouettes. Brands like Binks offer readymade FlexiFit™ blouses that provide comfort and a flattering fit, making it easier for women to find the perfect match for their sarees. The latest saree blouse designs reflect a blend of tradition and modernity, offering Indian women a wide range of options to express their personal style while embracing their cultural heritage.
## The Demand For Premium and Well Fitting Readymade Saree Blouses
The demand for premium and well-fitting readymade saree blouses has surged in recent times, as Indian women seek convenience without compromising on style and quality. With busy lifestyles, many prefer the ease of purchasing readymade blouses that offer a perfect fit and exquisite designs. The emphasis on quality fabrics, meticulous craftsmanship, and attention to detail ensures that these blouses meet the expectations of women looking for premium attire. Furthermore, the availability of diverse sizes and customizable options has made it easier for women to find blouses that complement their body type and personal style, thus driving the popularity of well-fitting readymade saree blouses in the Indian fashion market. Some of the main factors fueling this increasing demand are 
  * **Variety of Styles:** Modern women have access to an array of blouse designs, from traditional to contemporary, ensuring that there's a perfect match for every saree and occasion.
  * **Quality Fabrics and Craftsmanship:** Premium blouses are made with high-quality fabrics like silk, georgette, [viscose](https://getbinks.com/<https:/getbinks.com/collections/saree-blouses-viscose-rayon-fabric>), and velvet, and often feature intricate embroidery, sequins, and beadwork, appealing to those who seek luxury and durability.

## The Demand For Premium and Well Fitting Readymade Saree Blouses
The demand for premium and well-fitting readymade saree blouses has surged in recent times, as Indian women seek convenience without compromising on style and quality. With busy lifestyles, many prefer the ease of purchasing readymade blouses that offer a perfect fit and exquisite designs. Furthermore, the availability of diverse sizes and customizable options has made it easier for women to find blouses that complement their body type and personal style, thus driving the popularity of well-fitting readymade saree blouses in the Indian fashion market. Some of the main factors fueling this increasing demand are 
  * **Variety of Styles:** Modern women have access to an array of blouse designs, from traditional to contemporary, ensuring that there's a perfect match for every saree and occasion.

  * **E-commerce Convenience:** Online shopping has revolutionized the way women buy saree blouses, providing the ease of browsing through numerous options from the comfort of home.
  * **Customization Options:** Many online retailers offer customization services, allowing women to get a blouse that fits their measurements perfectly, without the need for alterations.
  * **Worldwide Shipping:** Global shipping has made it possible for Indian women living abroad to access the latest saree blouse designs, bridging the gap between traditional attire and global fashion trends.
  * **Time-Saving:** The availability of readymade blouses saves time and effort that would otherwise be spent in getting a blouse stitched and fitted.

Overall, the demand for premium and well-fitting readymade saree blouses is fueled by the desire for convenience, variety, and accessibility, with e-commerce platforms playing a pivotal role in meeting these needs.

generated_description:
### Binks: Redefining Tailoring for the Modern Indian Woman 

**Overview**  
Binks is an innovative apparel company founded in 2019, based in Bengaluru, India. Operating under the Y Combinator Batch S19, Binks is on a mission to transform the traditional tailoring market for women's clothing. Their model is groundbreaking: zero inventory and zero returns, seamlessly connecting fabrics and styles directly to consumers.

**The Pain Point**  
In India, especially for women, tailor-made clothing—particularly saree blouses—is a cultural mainstay. However, the existing tailoring market is fragmented and outdated, often requiring extensive time and physical store visits. The repetitive fitting process can be exhausting, especially for busy urbanites. Binks looks to solve these issues through an efficient online platform that reimagines the experience of ordering custom-made clothes.

**The Solution**  
Binks empowers women to shop for made-to-measure clothing from the comfort of their homes. Customers can easily place orders online, receive fittings via home visits, and get styling assistance, all before having their garments delivered directly to their doorsteps. Their patented **FlexiFit™** technology ensures the perfect fit, making style accessible and hassle-free.

**Product Offerings**  
Binks specializes in:
- FlexiFit™ Readymade Saree Blouses
- A wide range of sarees across various fabrics and designs
- Kurta Pant Sets, Lehengas, Dupattas, and more
- Comprehensive styles based on sleeve design, neck type, and occasion

They cater to both daily wear and special events with garments that focus on fit, fashion, and sustainability. Binks also supports diverse size ranges, accommodating body types from XS to 8XL, which is a game-changer in an industry often overlooked.

**Team and Operations**  
Binks operates with a growing team of 70 employees, all dedicated to enhancing the customer shopping experience and promoting sustainable fashion practices in the Indian clothing market. With support from group partners such as Nan, they have streamlined their supply chain for maximum efficiency.

**Final Thoughts**  
In a world where women seek both convenience and style, Binks stands out as a beacon for modern tailoring. By merging traditional craftsmanship with tech-forward solutions, they are not just selling blouses; they are reshaping how Indian women experience fashion. Whether for an everyday outing or a lavish wedding, Binks makes it easy to look fabulous without the fuss. 

Visit [getbinks.com](https://getbinks.com/) to explore their collections and redefine your wardrobe.
